content: Loved the trailer! I have a possible explanation to what Luke means by “It’s time for the Jedi to end.” https://medium.com/@JacobBurdis/star-wars-the-last-jedi-trailer-review-bringing-balance-to-the-force-5df776746acb Also did you catch the whispers during the trailer? Young Princess Leia: “Help me Obi-wan” (A New Hope)Obi-Wan Kenobi: “seduced by the dark side” (ROTJ)Yoda: “Surrounds us, and binds us” (Empire)
